textAfterTable: Uses: For the temporary relief of minor: Arthritis Pain Joint Pain Joint Stiffness Warnings: Do not use if pregnant or breast-feeding. Keep out of reach of children. If symptoms persist or worsen, a health professional should be consulted. Do not use if known sensitivity to T-Relief™ Arthritis or any of its ingredients exists. Directions: At first sign of symptoms: Adults: 1 tablet every ½ to 1 hour, until symptoms lessen, then continue with standard dosage. Do not exceed 12 tablets in 24 hours. For children under 18 years, consult your health professional. Standard dosage: Adults: 3 tablets per day, taking 1 tablet every 4 to 6 hours. For children under 18 years, consult your health professional. Allow tablets to dissolve completely in the mouth, do not swallow. Other Information: Tamper Evident: Use this product only if imprinted shrink seal around the neck and cap is intact. Store at room temperature. Protect from light and moisture. Please retain outer carton for full product instructions. Inactive Ingredients: Lactose, Magnesium stearate. Questions?
